title: 13 Reactions to Adele's Album of the Year Acceptance Speech at the Grammys
text:
After winning Album of the Year for 25 at the Grammys on Sunday, Adele spent most of her speech singing the praises of Beyonc√© and Lemonade ‚Äî dedicating the award to the singer for creating a musical masterpiece so empowering and important for black women everywhere.
Adele wins Album of the Year, dedicates it to Beyonce: "I can't possibly accept this award." #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/9Msjhz9Cj6
‚Äî Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 13, 2017
 In response, people took to Twitter with a rollercoaster of emotions, ranging from confusion to appreciation and everything in between. Here are just a few of the best responses.
1.
"HEY ADELE IMMA LET YOU FINISH, BUT BEYONCE HAD THE BEST ALBUM OF ALL TIME."
-Adele #GRAMMYs
‚Äî Faith Chüç©yce (@faithchoyce) February 13, 2017
